name: Lumberjill run
description:
Leaping from tree to tree, as they float down the mighty rivers of British Columbia. The Giant Redwood. The Larch. The Fir! The limping Roo tree of Nigeria. The towering Wattle of Aldershot! The naughty Leicestershire Flashing Oak! The flatulent Elm of West Ruislip!

Jump on the logs floating down the river and try to get upstream as far as you can in this 2.5D platform runner / jumper.

★ Two characters to choose: lumberjill and lumberjack
★ Simple tap controls designed exclusively for mobile Epic desktop controls! (hastily ported to desktop)
★ Infinite amount of floating logs (props, no trees have been harmed) which will become timber soon
★ Nobody will read this item
★ Epic running and jumping
★ Addictive and amazing visuals

Controls: mouse and space bar to jump.

Credits

3d characters: Martín Arregui (@tinchopunk)
Music: Jupitron (@jupitron)
Art and code: Luis Parravicini (@luisparravicini)
